goals__remit:
ERA' mission: 
 
ERA is, and will remain, the principal body that represents the interests of organisations involved in intra-European air transport by: 
a) influencing regulatory and environmental conditions, 
b) facilitating technical cooperation and advancement, and 
c) gaining public and political support
